summary: A masked vigilante who discovers the dark side to heroism. Going after the nation's most notorious super criminal leaves Sparks' life and reputation in ruins.
cast: Chase Williamson|Ashley Bell|Clancy Brown|Jake Busey|William Katt|Marina Squerciati|Clint Howard|Scott Rinker|David Sobolov|Larry Cedar|Esteban Cueto|Dave Hanson|Stephen Kearin|Jeremy Rowley|Austin Michael Coleman|Chase Johnston|Chris Gross|Ben Messmer|Cathleen Kaelyn|Lynne Marie Stewart|Kevin Sherwood|Meredith Zealy|Ron Zimmerman|Matthew Oster|Julius Weil|Corey Tocchini|Angelina Folino|Jarred Sutton|Ryan Veronick|Riley Rose Critchlow|Merritt Hemenway|James Clouet|Derek McCaw|Art Kulik|Stu Brumbaugh|Alberto De Diego|Tyler Endicott|Daniel Ross|Jeff Bordner|Dominic Folino|Emerson Katt|Greg Nolan|Misty Orman|Maria Forlenza Oster|Jake Ray|Brady Romberg|Cristina Sutton|James Sutton|Von Thomas

title: Sparks
